The NSC-R Tidy Tuesday workshop sessions are inspired by the [Tidy Tuesday](https://www.tidytuesday.com/) initiative, which is aimed at providing a safe and supportive forum for individuals to practice their data processing and visualization skills in R while working with real-world data.

This workshop (April 2, 2024, 13:00-14:00 CET) will focus on R and ChatGPT, and be led by Abby Onencan. Please join us  on Zoom by clicking [here](https://us02web.zoom.us/j/4539912989) using password *NSCR*.


> *Abby Onencan* is a researcher at the Erasmus School of Law at Erasmus University Rotterdam. Her research focuses on industrial environmental harms, specifically those resulting from the production and use of PFAS. She is a member of the NSC-R Workshops team.
